resources.string: "Detection device connection change Read the underlying node value failed Did not get the value"
"Detection device connection change Read the underlying node value failed Please insert the type-C turn to DP Cable to start the test"
"Detection device connection change Read the underlying node value failed Test Failed "
"Detection device connection change Read the underlying node value successfully Please observe whether the screen is successful, and click the corresponding button"
"Please click the button to init NFC,and then put the card on the top of the back of the device. Do not turn off the screen during the test"

"Infrared distance sensor: Cover the distance sensor with your hand, and then leave the distance sensor. Ultrasonic distance sensor: Please simulate the action of answering the device If the lower test area shows a value of 0.0 when approaching, and a 5.0 value shows when it is far away, the test is successful, otherwise the test fails."
"An OTG device insertion was detected, but could not get the device information Test failed"
"Device insertion was detected, but could not get device information Test failed"
"Operating instructions click the button to switch the touch mode to THP mode or FW mode"
